conversations.scenario: Standard legal intake with family law matter

messages.content: I need legal help but I'm not sure what kind. Can you help me?
My name is Sarah Johnson and I think I need help with a family law issue. My husband and I are considering divorce.
I live in Charlotte, North Carolina.
My phone is 704-555-0123 and email is sarah.johnson@email.com.

conversations.scenario: Urgent legal matter requiring immediate escalation

messages.content: I have an urgent legal problem and I need help immediately.
I'm safe, but I just received a restraining order and I need to respond within 24 hours. My name is Michael Chen.
I live in Raleigh, North Carolina.
My phone is 919-555-0123 and email is michael.chen@email.com.

parameters.description: Urgent restraining order response needed within 24 hours
parameters.name: Michael Chen

conversations.scenario: Complex legal situation requiring specialized expertise

messages.content: I have a complicated legal situation that involves multiple issues and I don't know where to start.
I'm David Rodriguez. I have a business dispute, employment issues, and potential tax problems all related to the same situation.
I live in Durham, North Carolina.
My phone is 919-555-0124 and email is david.rodriguez@email.com.

parameters.description: Complex multi-issue case involving business dispute, employment issues, and tax problems
parameters.name: David Rodriguez

conversations.scenario: Location service area verification and matter creation

messages.content: I need legal help but I'm not sure if you provide services in my area.
I'm in California and I need help with a personal injury case from a car accident.
My name is Maria Garcia, phone 415-555-0123, email maria.garcia@email.com.
I need legal help but I'm concerned about the cost. Can you tell me about your pricing?
My name is Thomas Brown and I need help with a landlord-tenant dispute.
I live in Greensboro, North Carolina.
My phone is 336-555-0123 and email is thomas.brown@email.com.
